Text:
I lost my copy of the game :(

So, Imma download this...

The image is garbled, I run a 4.3U (North America, right?) with usbloader gx...the screen is only black and white and jacked up...for some reason, the iso was only 1.2 gb or something small...i will give this another shot.

Ok just so everyone knows. If it is giving you the black and white screen you have to mess with the loading settings a little bit

My Mario Party 9 did the same thing and once fixed the video and loading settings it worked fine

Im using USBloader GX
did you force the region your in for the video settings, ie, if your ntsc force ntsc for non ntsc games and so forth
